Description: Rim sherd (mended from two fragments) of Chian, possibly Grand Style, pottery chalice; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky black below; very elaborate rosette and lotus flower chain in added white and added red with added black dots over top; top of rim glazed; exterior: dot and billet band at rim, reserved below; inscription on exterior.
Curator's comments: In pencil on exterior '45', perhaps corrected from '46'.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0749) (phase 2)
